mapper.select: select id,name from department order by id asc

select s.id as id, s.name as name, s.num as num, s.souko_id as souko_id, s.souko_name as souko_name, s.category_id as category_id, c.name as category_name, s.request_user_id as request_user_id, u.name as request_user_name, s.request_dept_id as request_dept_id, d.name as request_dept_name, s.status as status, sta.name as status_name, to_char(s.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as request_date, to_char(s.order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as order_date, to_char(s.delivery_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as delivery_date, to_char(s.instore_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as instore_date, to_char(s.outstore_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as outstore_date, s.note as note from sizai s inner join category c on s.category_id = c.id inner join users u on s.request_user_id = u.id inner join department d on s.request_dept_id = d.id inner join status sta on s.status = sta.code left join souko sou on s.souko_id = sou.id where s.request_dept_id = #{request_dept_id} and (s.status = '2' or s.status = '4')

select s.id as id, s.name as name, s.num as num, s.souko_id as souko_id, s.souko_name as souko_name, s.category_id as category_id, c.name as category_name, s.request_user_id as request_user_id, u.name as request_user_name, s.request_dept_id as request_dept_id, d.name as request_dept_name, s.status as status, sta.name as status_name, to_char(s.request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as request_date, to_char(s.order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as order_date, to_char(s.delivery_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as delivery_date, to_char(s.instore_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as instore_date, to_char(s.outstore_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as outstore_date, s.note as note from sizai s inner join category c on s.category_id = c.id inner join users u on s.request_user_id = u.id inner join department d on s.request_dept_id = d.id inner join status sta on s.status = sta.code left join souko sou on s.souko_id = sou.id where s.request_dept_id = #{request_dept_id} and (s.status = '4' or s.status = '5')
mapper.update: update sizai set status = '4', order_date = sysdate where id = #{request_id} and status = '2'
update sizai set status = '5' where id = #{request_id} and status = '4'
